response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product at a price that reflects its true value while ensuring a fair profit for me. Considering the quality and benefits of the product, I propose a price of $10,000. This offer not only provides you with a substantial return on your investment but also allows me to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
